degree: BA in Computer Science, Minor in Business
description: Graduated with a perfect GPA of 4.0, gaining in-depth knowledge in software development, algorithms, data structures, and business management. Developed a strong foundation in full-stack web development, with a focus on JavaScript, Java, and database systems. Completed several projects, including a capstone project on optimizing performance in distributed systems.

degree: Graduate Degree in Web Design and Development
description: Focused on mastering modern web technologies and best practices in user experience (UX) and responsive design. Gained expertise in JavaScript frameworks, such as React and Vue.js, and in full-stack development using Node.js. Graduated with a GPA of 3.5, with key projects focused on developing interactive web applications with a strong emphasis on accessibility and SEO.

Completed an intensive course on Design Thinking, focusing on innovation, creativity, and problem-solving approaches. Applied design thinking frameworks to various software development projects, learning how to build user-centered solutions and enhance product development cycles.
